page.title: 09LOCAL EMPLOYMENT 1
page.content: {International stores}is one of two supermarkets serving holsworthy and surrounding villages.it is situated in 'The Square'. The store at present employs 24 people at the Holsworthy branch,which copes with approximately{8000}people per week. There are four counter tills to deal with customers payments.The busiest days are Saturdays,and Wednesdays which is market day. The store itself has changed location as it was formerly a smaller store on the other side of the square.The supermarket sells everything from cornflakes to flour,and soft drinks to wine,thus dealing with all major consumer items required by the public.
